scripts.build: cd server && yarn build && cd ../client && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "CLIENT,SERVER" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "cd client && yarn dev" "cd server && yarn dev"
scripts.lint: cd client && yarn lint && cd ../server && yarn lint && cd ../shared && yarn lint
scripts.test: cd client && yarn test && cd ../server && yarn test && cd ../shared && yarn test
scripts.test-watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "CLIENT,SERVER,SHARED" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,blue.bold" "cd client && yarn test --watch" "cd server && yarn test --watch" "cd shared && yarn test --watch"
scripts.clean-deps: rimraf ./node_modules && rimraf client/node_modules && rimraf server/node_modules && rimraf shared/node_modules
